title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 19 September 2012 - XWiki

10:11 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
14:47 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <vmassol> hmm I'm wondering why the Repository app doesn't import milestones....  
14:49 <vmassol> for ex: http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/Extension/Repository+Application?editor=object doesn't list 4.2M1, M2 or M3  
14:50 <tekzilla> has joined #xwiki  
14:50 <vmassol> so right now someone who has XE 4.2M3 cannot install the Repository app  
14:50 <vmassol> (well he can but manually)  
15:02 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r333f513 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/333f513678446c6ac98914751fe3b803e528463d / (28 files): XWIKI-8215: Repository Application technical pages should be hidden by default - http://git.io/2IfOmw  
15:21 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r8d39115 https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/8d39115be8df8adda057da26be3fe50420310f7a / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-uiextension/xwiki-platform-uiextension-ui/src/main/resources/XWiki/UIExtensionSheet.xml : [Misc] Fix extra space that shouldn't be there - http://git.io/dflT-g  
15:21 <CIA-122> Vincent Massol master \* r527f22a https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/commit/527f22a7b4e0f96cd8f13a6aadecd28c9e3c211e / xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-repository/xwiki-platform-repository-server-ui/src/main/resources/ExtensionCode/ApplicationsPanelEntry.xml : XWiki-8216: Add Application Panel entry for the Repository Application - http://git.io/-XTshw  
15:35 <vmassol> mflorea: could you tell me what URL to use for http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/Share+AppWithinMinutes+Application ?  
15:36 <+mflorea> WDYM?  
15:36 <vmassol> for UserRepositoryClass  
15:36 <vmassol> the extension repo URL  
15:36 <vmassol> I don't know the format  
15:36 <vmassol> is it a view url? a rest url?  
15:36 <vmassol> if rest, what should it point ot?  
15:38 <+mflorea> try http://yourserver.foo if it doesn't work, try adding /xwiki/rest  
15:38 <vmassol> ok  
15:39 <+mflorea> I don't remember exactly the format, I would need to check the code. It's a rest url for sure, but I don't remember if I add the /xwiki/rest or not  
15:40 <vmassol> ok it worked with http://localhost:8080  
15:40 <vmassol> so you must add the rest part  
15:48 <+sburjan> found another issue, reporting it now  
15:52 <+sburjan> http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-8217
